name: Car Driving 2023: Drift Games
description:
Drive awesome drift cars and explore the city map. Supercars like lambo, R8, rover and limo in a huge driving city ready to explore. Drive as fast as you can and drift on 6 amazing different tracks. Some tracks contains hard levels to pass some tracks contains easy levels.This big city is full of details like hills, twisted roads, country side and awesome ramps.
E30 drift car and driving simulator has career mode, where you can play over 80 levels.
You can play drift mode, free open world driving mode, traffic mode, obstacle mode ( is like a police driving school where you can learn to avoid hitting obstacles, on a twisted road full of ramps) and multiplayer ramps mode, where you can drift, drive and jump on ramps with your friends. This is not the only one drift simulator with e30 car, but for sure is one of the best games. Make your choice between city cars, 4x4 cars, and speed cars. The game has realistic graphics.
